quote_first: Charlotte remembered that she had heard Gregoire go downstairs again, almost immediately after entering his bedroom, and before the servants had even bolted the house-doors for the night. He had certainly rushed off to join Therese in some coppice, whence they must have hurried away to Vieux-Bourg station which the last train to Paris quitted at
quote_last: . And it was indeed this which had taken place.
title: Fruitfulness
author: Emile Zola

quote_first: I mean, look at the time!
quote_last: ! It was a triumph, it really was!
title: The Soldier's Wife
author: Joanna Trollope
